chav1961.purelib.ui.interfacers

Interface FormManager<Id,Instance>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionFormManager<Id,Instance>, FieldFormManager<Id,Instance>, RecordFormManager<Id,Instance>

    public interface FormManager<Id,Instance>
extends RecordFormManager<Id,Instance>, FieldFormManager<Id,Instance>, ActionFormManager<Id,Instance>

    This class is an abstract class for implementing low-level UI form management. This class supports:

    • Creole-styled multi-paged UI form description
    • UI form inheritance
    • a lot of form representation on the UI screen
    • a lot of field representation on the UI screen
    • supporting callback (see FormManager) for the form management
    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

      • getLogger

      • getForEditor

        default FormManager<?,?> getForEditor(Instance inst,
                                      Id id,
                                      String fieldName)
                               throws FlowException

        Get form manager to manipulate with local editors (for example, lists, tables etc)

        Parameters:
        inst - current record instance
        id - primary key of the current record instance
        fieldName - field name to get manager for
        Returns:
        form manager to manipulate or null if missing
        Throws:
        FlowException - on any errors or on action cancelling
